channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Page/Post Content Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Page/Post Content Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2021-24819|2024-08-03T19:42:17.341Z -- unknown -- page%2Fpost%20content%20shortcode
item.description: The Page/Post Content Shortcode WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have proper authorisation in place, allowing users with a role as low as contributor to access draft/private/password protected/trashed posts/pages they should not be allowed to, including posts created by other users such as admins and editors.
